title: Mark Zuckerberg reveals new Quest Pro VR headset
description: Facebook-owner Meta has revealed a new VR headset as part of its continued metaverse push.

title: Court win for man fired after turning webcam off
description: An American IT company asked the employee to keep his webcam on while he worked.

title: Asia chipmaker shares slide after US curbs on China
description: On Friday, Washington announced new rules to restrict sales of semiconductor technology to China.

title: Celebration of women in science and tech ending
description: This year's Ada Lovelace Day will be the last because of a lack of corporate funding.

title: A third of children have adult social media accounts - Ofcom
description: Children are at risk of viewing harmful content by lying about their age online, according to Ofcom.
